resources.string: The conversion result from %1$s %2$s to %3$s is %4$s

This Conversion App was developed as an educational tool to help users convert values between units such as temperature, length, and weight.

The temperature conversion feature allows you to quickly and accurately convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

The app is designed with a simple and user-friendly interface, ideal for students, teachers, and the general public.

Developed by Faris Rizky Ramadhan as part of a mobile programming learning project.

Copyright © 2025.

This Conversion App provides a length unit conversion feature to help users calculate values between units such as millimeters, centimeters, meters, kilometers, inches, feet, and miles.

The length conversion feature is designed to be easy to use and deliver accurate results quickly.

This app is very useful for students, engineers, and anyone who needs a practical length measurement tool.

Developed by Faris Rizky Ramadhan as part of a mobile programming learning project.

Copyright © 2025. All rights reserved.

This Conversion App also supports weight unit conversion to help users calculate values between units such as milligrams, grams, kilograms, tons, ounces, and pounds.

The weight conversion feature is designed with an intuitive interface and provides fast results.

It is ideal for use in learning, cooking, logistics, or any other activity involving weight units.

Developed by Faris Rizky Ramadhan as part of a mobile programming learning project.

Copyright © 2025. All rights reserved.
